title: 1/BD 1/BA, Onsite bike storage, Upgraded interior
posting_body: Maris at Martinez is your everyday escape, ideally nestled in the hills of the East Bay.
Our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments feature gorgeous spaces designed for high-end style and comfort.
Modern finishes are sleek and chic throughout the home, while energy-efficient appliances and an in-home washer and dryer effortlessly keep chores under control.

-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, electric range, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Featured amenity
-Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements

-Relaxing resort-style pool and sundeck                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity

-Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion and firepit                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas
